doc.title: Browser Differences

value.title: Browser Differences
value.content: Netscape 7.x (all platforms) and Internet Explorer 6 (Windows) support the W3C XSLT 1.0 standard (http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt). IE 5.0 and 5.5 (both Windows) supported only the working draft of XSLT, and thus are not compatible with XSLT 1.0 stylesheets. Netscape 6.x only partially supported XSLT 1.0.

doc.summary: Netscape 7.x (all platforms) and Internet Explorer 6 (Windows) support the W3C XSLT 1.0 standard (http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt). IE 5.0 and 5.5 (both Windows) supported only the working draft of XSLT, and thus are not compatible with XSLT 1.0 stylesheets. Netscape 6.x only partially supported XSLT 1.0.
